xsdps_sinit.c File Reference

Detailed Description

The implementation of the XSdPs component's static initialization functionality.

 MODIFICATION HISTORY:

 Ver   Who    Date     Changes
 ----- ---    -------- -----------------------------------------------
 1.00a hk/sg  10/17/13 Initial release

#include "xstatus.h"
#include "xsdps.h"

Functions

XSdPs_Config * XSdPs_LookupConfig (u16 DeviceId)

Function Documentation

XSdPs_Config* XSdPs_LookupConfig (  u16  DeviceId  ) 
 

Looks up the device configuration based on the unique device ID. A table contains the configuration info for each device in the system.

Parameters:
DeviceId contains the ID of the device to look up the configuration for.
Returns:
A pointer to the configuration found or NULL if the specified device ID was not found. See xsdps.h for the definition of XSdPs_Config.

Note:
None.
